title: Skin concept: Mecha Nidalee, Mecha Elise and Mecha-Gnar! - Transformers!
body:
For Elise and Nidalee: Transforming from one Mecha form to another would have a sci-fi transformer-animation! One that looks like it could happen without interrupting movement. 

For Gnar (and this one's a bit far-fetched): Obviously the components of Mecha Mini-Gnar couldn't possibly constitute a Mecha Mega-Gnar (hehe Mecha mega) without feeling hollow. So instead, Mecha Gnar's rage meter is treated like an energy-storage meter, and when full, the energy is released, engulfing Mecha Gnar in a translucent geometric-Sci-fi-twist-Mega-gnar-shaped-crystalline-power-shield exoskeleton.
